messages.messageBody:
Thanks guys.You helped me very much.I just had a history test.It was easy cuz I like very much history.The last subject was "Which person impressed you the most".I said about TAKEDA SHINGEN.I wrote about some things you told me.I think I put my history teacher it a big difficulty.She was lucky because I didn't say about some things like the Kawanakajima battles against Uesugi.Thanx very much.

Edy

P.S.:From the 1st of Septemeber until the 13th I was on vacation(at the Black Sea;we(children) have in a 3 month vacation.I'm gonna change my address because.It's gonna be edyzemail@... Keep in touch.



Eddy
